@graph.name: Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: heavenly simple and sinfully delicious recipes

@graph.caption: 12 vegan cinnamon rolls covered with frosting in a glass dish

@graph.name: Vegan Cinnamon Rolls - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These vegan cinnamon rolls are super fluffy, soft, and gooey and they're topped off with a delicious vegan cream cheese frosting. They're always a huge hit!

@graph.name: Vegan Cinnamon Rolls
@graph.description: These vegan cinnamon rolls are super fluffy, soft, and gooey and they're topped off with a delicious vegan cream cheese frosting. They're always a huge hit and nobody will believe you they're completely vegan!
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup unsweetened almond milk, at room temperature
6 tablespoons softened vegan butter (at room temperature)
1/4 cup vegan cream cheese (my favorite is Trader Joe's plain vegan cream cheese)

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the vegan butter in a small saucepan on the stovetop. It shouldn’t boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the vegan butter in a small saucepan on the stovetop. It shouldn’t boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the brown sugar, the almond milk, and the melted vegan butter in a large bowl. Stir with a wooden spoon until combined. Let it cool slightly for about 2 minutes. It should be warm but not hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the brown sugar, the almond milk, and the melted vegan butter in a large bowl. Stir with a wooden spoon until combined. Let it cool slightly for about 2 minutes. It should be warm but not hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the yeast over the mixture. Let it sit for 5 minutes. The yeast should be foamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the yeast over the mixture. Let it sit for 5 minutes. The yeast should be foamy.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the flour, the cinnamon, and the salt and stir with a wooden spoon until combined. The dough will be sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add the flour, the cinnamon, and the salt and stir with a wooden spoon until combined. The dough will be sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the bowl with a towel and set in a warm place for 1 hour. It will rise and should about double in size.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the bowl with a towel and set in a warm place for 1 hour. It will rise and should about double in size.

recipeInstructions.text: Place on a floured surface. Knead with your hands. Then use a rolling pin and roll it out into a rectangle (about 24x15 inches, but you don’t have to be exact). The dough should be about ¼ inch thick.
recipeInstructions.name: Place on a floured surface. Knead with your hands. Then use a rolling pin and roll it out into a rectangle (about 24x15 inches, but you don’t have to be exact). The dough should be about ¼ inch thick.

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the vegan butter and spread the melted butter evenly over the dough rectangle. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the vegan butter and spread the melted butter evenly over the dough rectangle. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.

recipeInstructions.text: Starting at one of the short ends, tightly roll up the dough and seal the edges. Place it with the seam side down.
recipeInstructions.name: Starting at one of the short ends, tightly roll up the dough and seal the edges. Place it with the seam side down.

recipeInstructions.text: With a sharp knife, cut the roll into 12 equal pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: With a sharp knife, cut the roll into 12 equal pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Generously grease an 8x8-inch square pan (or round pan) with vegan butter. Place the cinnamon rolls in the pan with the cut-side up.
recipeInstructions.name: Generously grease an 8x8-inch square pan (or round pan) with vegan butter. Place the cinnamon rolls in the pan with the cut-side up.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place for about 45 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with plastic wrap and let rise in a warm place for about 45 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Remove the plastic wrap and bake for 25- 30 minutes until lightly golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Remove the plastic wrap and bake for 25- 30 minutes until lightly golden.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the vegan cream cheese frosting. Place all of the ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix with an electric mixer until well-combined and fluffy.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the vegan cream cheese frosting. Place all of the ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix with an electric mixer until well-combined and fluffy.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the cinnamon rolls cool down for about 10-15 minutes. Then evenly spread the cream cheese icing on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the cinnamon rolls cool down for about 10-15 minutes. Then evenly spread the cream cheese icing on top.
